code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import BlogPost from'./BlogPost';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BlogList=()=>{const[blogs,setBlogs]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchBlogs=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("".concat(process.env.PUBLIC_URL,"/Blogs/Blog1.json"));const data=await response.json();setBlogs(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching the blog data',error);}};fetchBlogs();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Blog Posts"}),blogs.map(blog=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BlogPost,{blog:blog},blog.id))]});};export default BlogList;
